EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, LegalZoom's documents are able to accommodate same-sex couples/domestic partners. Although the questionnaire will assume you and your partner to be "husband" and "wife", or ?spouse?, you may answer the questions as though you were addressed as partners. You and your partner may assign each other the role of "husband" or "wife" to maintain consistency throughout the questionnaire. In addition, please add a note in the "Special Instructions" box found on the Payment Page about your actual relationship so that your document may be created properly.
I have included a complimentary ?Estate Planning Guide? to help you become more familiar with LegalZoom's documents.
Please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 if we can be of further assistance. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
